description.narrative: The project comprises (i) construction of a new 28 km two-lane bypass road skirting the city of Kobuleti, and widening of 6 km of the the existing two-lane road between Kobuleti and Batumi to four lanes; (ii) strengthening the asset management capacity of the Roads Department; and (iii) improving road safety.

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President

description.narrative: Improvement of the subregional road network

title.narrative: Reports and Recommendations of the President
Decrease in road accident rate from 1.3 per million vehicle-km on the existing road to 0.68 on the Kobuleti bypass road by 2019

description.narrative: Improvement of the subregional road network

title.narrative: Increase in average traffic volume on the Kobuleti bypass from 7700 per day in 2011 to 9400 in 2019

description.narrative: Improvement of the subregional road network

title.narrative: Decrease in travel time for the Choloki-Sarpi trip to less than 0.6 hour after project completion
